TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonDropDown implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: Represents a list of items that a user can choose from and a list of Ribbon buttons that a user can click.

span.span: Represents a list of items that a user can choose from and a list of Ribbon buttons that a user can click.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以包含对象和控件。A can contain objects and controls. 你可以创建通过使用在运行时方法对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 无法添加到按钮在运行时功能区加载到 Office 后的集合。You cannot add buttons to the collection at run time after the Ribbon has been loaded into Office. 下面的过程介绍如何添加对象和控件添加到。The procedures below explain how to add objects and controls to a . ### 若要在设计时添加 RibbonDropDownItem 对象To add RibbonDropDownItem objects at design time 1. 单击**项**中的属性**属性**窗口。Click the **Items** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**).Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在**下拉列表中集合编辑器**、 添加、 排序和编辑新项。In the **DropDown Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new items. 你可以添加控件添加到在设计时。You can add controls to a at design time. ### 在设计时添加 RibbonButton 控件To add RibbonButton controls at design time 1. 单击**按钮**中的属性**属性**窗口。Click the **Buttons** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**).Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在**按钮集合编辑器**、 添加、 排序和编辑新按钮控件。In the **Button Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new button controls. 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此类型的某些成员。Some members of this type can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: Occurs when a user clicks a button on a .

span.span: Occurs when a user clicks a button on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户单击时，将不会引发此事件`Item`上。This event is not raised when a user clicks an `Item` on a .

summary.span: Gets a collection of objects that belong to this .

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that belong to this .

value.span: 一个属于此 的 对象集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that belong to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可同时包含控件和控件。The control can contain both controls and controls. 你可以将按钮添加到仅在功能区加载之前的属性。You can add buttons to the property only before the Ribbon loads. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets an image this is displayed on this .

span.span: Gets or sets an image this is displayed on this .

value.span: 显示在 上的图像。

span.span: The image that is displayed on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识由控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置属性，和属性会被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性提供更好地控制比其他两个属性，因为每次对控件进行更新时，图像对象被发送到 Office 应用程序会比较慢。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当你将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果你设置属性在运行时，你必须设置属性`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识由控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序检索此映像从你的解决方案一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置仅在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载期间事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称将显示功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，无法使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 有关设置此属性的详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md). 若要加载的映像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查属性并设置属性到想要加载的映像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序将检索映像你解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当你将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果你设置属性在运行时，你必须设置属性`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: Gets a collection of the items in this .

span.span: Gets a collection of the items in this .

value.span: 中项的集合。

span.span: A collection of collection of items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以添加对象添加到在设计时或在运行时。You can add objects to a at design time or at run time.

summary.span: Occurs when controls are loaded into the .

span.span: Occurs when controls are loaded into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首次用户展开下拉列表菜单时，将引发此事件。This event is raised the first time the user expands the drop-down menu. 如果在运行时修改菜单上的控件或更改任何属性此，也是首次用户展开菜单后进行更改时将引发此事件。If you modify the controls on the menu at run time or change any properties of this , this event is also raised the first time the user expands the menu after the change is made.

summary.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this .

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this .

value.span: 此 上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on this .

summary.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识由控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关的列表`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当你将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果你设置属性在运行时，你必须设置属性`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将分配给下拉列表框中的 Microsoft Office 图标。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a drop down box. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 添加到组下拉列表框。Add a drop down box to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#3)]

summary.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屏幕提示值必须少于 1024年个字符的长度。The ScreenTip value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，值将显示的标题为。When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: Gets or sets the that is currently selected.

span.span: Gets or sets the that is currently selected.

value.span: 当前选定的 。

span.span: The that is currently selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为导致要出现在下拉列表的文本框部分的项。Setting this property to a causes the item to appear in the text box portion of the drop-down list. 引用，它将分配给属性必须存在于此对象的集合。The reference that you assign to the property must exist in this object's collection. 否则为将引发。Otherwise, an will be thrown. 分配新值赋给属性不会导致引发事件。Assigning a new value to the property does not cause a event to be raised. 如果集合不为空，则此属性不是`null`。If the collection is not empty, then this property is not `null`. 默认情况下，此属性是指中的第一个项集合。By default, this property refers to the first item in the collection.

summary.span: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected .

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected .

value.span: 当前选定的 的索引。

span.span: The index of the currently selected .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置索引号属性会导致中的此位置中才会显示在下拉列表的文本框部分的集合。Setting the property to an index number causes the in that position in the collection to appear in the text box portion of the drop-down list. 分配新值赋给属性不会导致引发事件。Assigning a new value to the property does not cause a event to be raised. 分配给值必须介于 0 （零） 通过 (`Items.Count` -1)。Values assigned to the must be from 0 (zero) through (`Items.Count` - 1). 如果集合为空，则此属性返回-1。If the collection is empty, this property returns -1.

summary.span: Occurs when a user selects a new item on a Ribbon drop-down control.

span.span: Occurs when a user selects a new item on a Ribbon drop-down control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当在所选的项更改，并不处于以下情况下，将引发事件：The event is raised only when the selected item changes, and not in the following circumstances: - 当用户选择已选定的项的。When the user selects the item that was already selected. - 当用户单击一个按钮。When a user clicks a button. - 当你将新值赋给或在代码中的属性。When you assign a new value to the or properties in your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性自动设置为`true`如果你设置， ，或在功能区设计器中的属性。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the Ribbon Designer. 你可以将其设置为`false`若要使此控制选项可隐藏与关联的图像。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 设置， ，或属性在运行时不会更改的值属性。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能在运行时设置此属性。This property cannot be set at run time.

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

value.span: 默认值为 。

summary.span: Gets or sets a string that determines the size of the .

span.span: Gets or sets a string that determines the size of the .

value.span: 一个字符串，其长度可确定此 的大小。

span.span: A string, the length of which determines the size of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置中功能区设计器中，Visual Studio 尝试大小属性以便将足以显示整个字符串。When you set the property in the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio tries to size the so that it will be large enough to display the entire string. 尽管 Visual Studio 允许的长度最多为 1024年个字符的字符串，在实践中可用的字符串长度可能短得多。Although Visual Studio allows a string of up to 1024 characters in length, in practice the usable string length might be much shorter. 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同、字符串中的启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.
